title: Create context coordinator for inter-agent communication
description: Implement scripts/context-coordinator.py to manage shared context between parallel execution agents. Include session registration/heartbeat, context publication/subscription, stale session detection (60s timeout), and context merging on conflicts. Store in .claude/shared-context/ directory.
completion_notes: Implemented context coordinator with session management, context pub/sub, stale detection, intelligent merging, and monitoring capabilities
notes: Optional enhancement for quality improvement in parallel execution
